title: Personal Portfolio
tagline: The responsive, data-driven site you are viewing right now
desc: A modern portfolio website built with Flask. Features a JSON-driven content architecture for easy updates.
overview: A high-performance, data-driven portfolio website designed to serve as a centralized content management system. Unlike typical static site generators, this application uses a custom JSON-based architecture to decouple data from the presentation layer.
problem: Static HTML portfolios are difficult to maintain, and CMS solutions like WordPress are too heavy. I needed a lightweight, custom solution that demonstrated full-stack capability while remaining performant.
solution: I built a Flask (Python) application that renders Jinja2 templates dynamically. The frontend implements a glassmorphism design system using raw CSS variables for easy theming.

challenges.title: CSS Architecture
challenges.desc: Managing glassmorphism effects across light and dark modes.

challenges.title: Asset Optimization
challenges.desc: Implemented lazy loading for a Lighthouse score of 95+.

title: FamilyConnect
tagline: M.Sc. Final Project — Private social messaging prototype
desc: A private social feed for families with secure auth and image optimization.
overview: FamilyConnect is a private social networking prototype designed to simulate the core architecture of platforms like Facebook, but optimized for close-knit family groups with a focus on privacy.
problem: Public social networks monetize data. There was a need for a self-hostable, isolated environment for families to share updates securely.
solution: A monolithic Flask application backed by a normalized MySQL database. Implements strict Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and server-side image compression.

challenges.title: Database Normalization
challenges.desc: Efficiently linking Users, Posts, and Comments without N+1 query issues.

title: Workplace
tagline: M.Sc. Mini Project — Academic team workflow hub
desc: A centralized dashboard for student teams to manage tasks and documents.
overview: Workplace is a collaborative task management hub designed specifically for academic teams. It provides a single dashboard for tracking deadlines and sharing resources.
problem: Student group projects often fail due to fragmented communication. Teams lacked a 'Single Source of Truth'.
solution: A lightweight project management tool using Flask. Features a Kanban-style workflow and file repository.

challenges.title: Route Protection
challenges.desc: Securing admin routes against unauthorized access.

title: Tic Tac Toe AI
tagline: Python graphics project with custom AI engine
desc: A graphical game built from scratch using Python Turtle with a custom AI.
overview: A graphical implementation of Tic Tac Toe featuring a custom-built AI opponent. This project served as a study in game state management and heuristic algorithms.
problem: Rendering a responsive GUI and programming an opponent that actually 'blocks' user moves efficiently.
solution: Written in Python Turtle. The AI evaluates the board state after every turn to identify winning threats and block them.

challenges.title: Coordinate Mapping
challenges.desc: Translating pixel clicks to the logical 3x3 game matrix.

title: Departmental Portal
tagline: B.Sc. Final Project — Digital notice board & CMS
desc: A digital portal for university faculty and students with a custom CMS.
overview: A digital portal for the Computer Science department, digitizing the traditional notice board. It provides a CMS for faculty to publish news and a responsive interface for students.
problem: Critical information about exams was often missed because it was only posted on a physical board.
solution: A dynamic website with an Admin Panel. Faculty upload notices which are pushed to the student news feed.

challenges.title: Legacy Browser Support
challenges.desc: Ensuring functionality on older university lab computers.

title: Watermark Studio
tagline: Python utility for batch image processing
desc: A desktop tool that applies transparent watermarks to images in bulk.
overview: A desktop automation tool built to batch-process images. It allows creators to apply transparent watermarks to hundreds of photos in seconds.
problem: Manually watermarking event photos is tedious. Online tools often reduce quality.
solution: A native GUI app using Tkinter and Pillow. Performs pixel-perfect alpha compositing.

challenges.title: Aspect Ratio Logic
challenges.desc: Keeping watermarks proportional on different image sizes.

title: Snake Game
desc: A study in game loop architecture and collision detection algorithms.
overview: A faithful recreation of the classic arcade Snake game. Explores game loops, collision detection, and real-time input.
problem: Understanding real-time user input and screen updates without lagging.
solution: Implemented using Pygame. Uses a queue-based system for the snake body.

challenges.title: Input Latency
challenges.desc: Preventing the snake from turning into itself during rapid key presses.
